Service Details: - Provides supports and services for adults with a developmental disability- Services include youth in transition, employment support, time management, education support, health/medication reminders, hygiene/grooming, mentoring, counseling, light housekeeping, home/community safety awareness, breakfast club, social/peer interaction opportunities, summer youth programs, seniors in home and community support
Cost: Service ; Funded through Community Living British Columbia and Ministry of Children and Families OR Pay for service
